description.value: When your Raise a Shield, you can Interact to draw a weapon with your free hand.

When you make a shout action or activiy, you gain 5 temporary hit points (+2 for each ally at shout range, to a maximum of allies equal to your Constitution's modifier) that last 1 round. You can benefit from this effect once per round.

Alchimiste Votre corps s'est habitué à être maltraité et a développé une résistance aux pathogènes et aux maladies. Votre rang de maîtrise pour les jets de Vigueur devient maître. Quand vous obtenez un succès sur un jet de Vigueur, vous remportez à la place un succès critique.

Barbare, Champion, Franc-tireur, Guerrier, Inventeur, Magus, Rôdeur, Thaumaturge Votre corps s'est habitué à l'effort physique et à résister aux maladies. Votre rang de maîtrise pour les jets de Vigueur devient maître. Quand vous obtenez un succès sur un jet de Vigueur, vous remportez à la place un succès critique.

Requirements You are conscious and none of your senses are impaired.

Trigger You have made an initiative roll and one of your allies has a lower result, and no creatures have acted yet. 

You can exchange your place in initiative order with an ally with a lower initiative roll. You can affect this character with a one-action shout, if you do so, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Ralenti (Slowed) 1} for the first round.

You regain one more Focus point (to a maximum of your Focus pool) when refocusing. Once per day, if you did not make a shout ability during your turn, you instantly recover 1 Focus point at the beginning of your next turn.

Vous êtes l'émissaire d'une divinité, un serviteur dévoué qui a pris de lourdes responsabilités et vous adhérez à un code qui vous distingue de votre entourage. Il existe des champions de tous les alignements, mais vous êtes un champion du bien qui inspire infaillibilité et espoir aux innocents. Vous disposez de puissants moyens de défense que vous partagez volontiers avec vos alliés et les badauds innocents, ainsi que des pouvoirs divins que vous utilisez pour éliminer la menace du mal. Votre dévotion attire même l'attention d'esprits divins qui vous soutiennent lors de vos périples.

Caractéristique essentielle : FORCE ou DEXTÉRITÉ

Au niveau 1, votre classe vous donne une prime de caractéristique à la Force ou à la Dextérité (vous choisissez).

Points de vie : 10 plus votre modificateur de Constitution

Vous augmentez votre maximum de PV de ce montant au niveau 1, puis à chaque fois que vous gagnez un niveau.

Jouer un champion

Lors des rencontres de combat...

Vous affrontez vos ennemis au corps-à-corps tout en vous positionnant soigneusement de manière à protéger vos alliés.

Lors des rencontres sociales...

Vous êtes la voix de l'espoir œuvrant pour trouver une solution pacifique qui renforce les relations et satisfait le plus grand nombre.

En exploration...

Vous surmontez les obstacles tant physiques que spirituels, en inspirant vos alliés par vos actions et, quand vos compagnons d'aventures vous le demandent, en les conseillant d'un point de vue moral et éthique.

Pendant un intermède...

Vous consacrez la plupart de votre temps en contemplation et prières solennelles, en entraînement rigoureux, à faire du bénévolat pour des organisations caritatives et à appliquer les principes de votre code, mais il vous reste toujours un peu de temps pour pratiquer un métier ou un passe-temps.

Vous...

  • Espérez toujours voir le bien triompher du mal, même dans les situations les plus désespérées.
  • Savez que la fin ne justifie pas les moyens car les agissements malveillants participent au développement du mal.
  • Avez un sens aigu de ce qui est juste ou non, et l'avarice et le manque de vision à long terme vous frustrent.

Les autres...

  • Vous voient comme un symbole d'espoir, surtout lors des périodes de crise.
  • Se demandent si vous ne les méprisez pas en silence parce qu'ils ne vivent pas selon vos impossibles principes ou que vous ne consentirez pas à faire des compromis si c'est nécessaire.
  • Savent que vous avez prêté un serment au service d'une divinité et qu'ils peuvent vous faire confiance pour le remplir.

Maîtrises initiales

Au niveau 1, vous gagnez les rangs de maîtrise indiqués pour les statistiques suivantes. Vous êtes inexpérimenté pour tout ce qui ne figure pas ci-dessous, à moins d'obtenir un rang de maîtrise supérieur d'une autre manière.

Perception

Expert in Perception

Jets de sauvegarde

Expert in Fortitude

Trained in Reflex

Expert in Will

Compétences

Trained in Diplomacy

Trained in 1 or more skills determined by your paragon's presence

Trained in a number of additional skills equal to 2 plus your Intelligence modifier

Attaques

Trained in simple weapons

Trained in martial weapons

Trained in unarmed attacks

Défenses

Trained in light and medium armor

Trained in unarmored defense

DD de classe

Qualifié dans le DD de classe champion

Sorts

Trained in paragon Class DC

Class features

En tant que champion, vous gagnez les capacités suivantes. Pour les capacités obtenues à des niveaux supérieurs, le niveau requis est indiqué à côté du nom de la capacité.

Your level Class features
1 Ancestry and background, initial proficiencies, lead the way, presence of paragon, shouts, thrown weapon specialist, warcries and signets, paragon feat
2 Paragon feat, skill feat
3 Imbued armement, lightning reflex, general feat,  skill increase
4 Paragon feat, skill feat
5 Cry of resolve, ability boosts, ancestry feat, skill increase, weapon expertise
6 Paragon feat, skill feat
7 Lingering shouts, general feat, skill increase, weapon specialization
8 Paragon feat, skill feat
9 Ancestry feat, undomitable will, armor expertise, skill increase
10 Ability boosts, paragon feat, skill feat
11 Presence of glory, juggernaut, general feat, skill increase
12 Paragon feat, skill feat
13 Chorus of element, ancestry feat, skill increase, weapon mastery
14 Paragon feat, skill feat
15 Ability boosts, evasion, general feat, greater weapon specialization, skill increase
16 Paragon feat, skill feat
17 Presence of prestige, ancestry feat, armor mastery, skill increase
18 Paragon feat, skill feat
19 General feat, skill increase
20 Ability boosts, paragon feat, skill feat

Ascendance et historique

En plus des capacités que votre classe vous accorde au niveau 1, vous bénéficiez des avantages de votre ascendance et de votre historique.

Dons de champion

Au niveau 1, puis tous les niveaux pairs, vous gagnez un don de classe de champion.

Shouts

Paragons gain an arsenal of shouts depending of their experience, their divine faith or by magic. The paragon gain access to actions, activities and reactions with the shout trait. 

The main mechanic of the paragon class is to manage your shouts in battle. Shouts can be actions, activities, reaction, or free actions. Paragons have access to three shouts at level 1 (see below). If your shouts have an Amp entry, it means you can spend one focus point to amplify your shout and gain additional effects.  The shout trait, that you will find under shouts abilities, has the following features.


SHOUT [TRAIT]
You need a voice to shout, and you need to share the same language with your targets. Shouts have the auditory  trait and need to be heard clearly by your targets. Effects of your shouts last until the beginning of your next turn if not specified otherwise and have a range of 30 feet. Finally, when you make a specific shout action or activity, this particular shout can not be performed again until the end of your next turn. In other terms, your shouts, except reactions, have a one turn recharge time.

 

Level 1 shouts

@UUID[Item.TLxUty5gdnLDpAU4]{On my mark!}A

Determination in your voice fills your allies with courage and make them know when to strike.

@UUID[Item.w4BWNmSOCLweLbEE]{On guard!}A

You are aware when danger can strike your ally and urge an ally to perfect its defense against it. 

@UUID[Item.5IGPae4HkAHp3G2U]{Rally!}A

You hurry your group to retreat from battle, or charge forward

Paragon's Presence

Choose one presence among the three availables. Each presence displays a unique way to play the parangon class and get their own abilities and feats.

  • @UUID[Item.pqqUrzSlGjQMvBVQ]{Commander} Commanders are feared in battle, as their shouts often covers the sound of the air pierced by their fierce spear.
  • @UUID[Item.LwGlQic5tv42HPNE]{Chieftain} Vivifying shouts of Chieftains allow they allies to stand their ground beyond their own resources.
  • @UUID[Item.Vm98b9gw4c2nuimW]{Defender} You have dedicated your life to others. Always in front line, defenders are sturdy, and reliable.

Warcry and Signets

Your experience of battle and your training grant you special powerful shouts or augmentations called  respectively warcries and signets, which are a type of focus spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell, and you start with a focus pool of 2 Focus Points. You refill your focus pool during your daily preparations, and you regain 1 Focus Point by spending 10 minutes using the Refocus activity to train, meditate, or healing wounds of a battle.
Warcries and signets are automatically heightened to half your level rounded up. Certain feats can give you more focus spells and increase the size of your focus pool, though your focus pool can never hold more than 3 Focus Points.


SIGNETS

Actions with the signet trait, usually from paragon feats, tweak the properties of your shouts, like metamagic for spellcasters. You must use a signet action directly before using the shout action you want to alter. If you use any action (including free actions and reactions) other than a shout action directly after, you waste the benefits of the signet action. Any additional effects added by a signet action are part of the shout’s effect, not of the signet action itself.
You gain the @UUID[Item.YBl81rzE3WuCaxly]{Signet of Life} signet.

Thrown weapon specialist

You gain 2 bonus damage with weapons with the thrown trait until the end of your turn if you have made a shout during your turn.
When you make ranged attacks with thrown weapons, that are not agile or finesse, you can choose to use your Strength's modifier instead of your Dexterity for your ranged attack rolls. Weapons used this way gains the volley trait with a distance equal to it's thrown trait, giving you a -2 to your attack rolls.

At level 3, the bonus damage increases to 3, and the volley trait penalty is reduced to 1.

At level 7, the bonus damage increases to 5.

At level 13, the bonus damage increases to 7.

At level 13, the bonus damage increases to 10. Increase the range increments of your thrown weapons by 5 feet, and reduce the penalty to ranged attacks above your first increment by 1.

Lead the way

You gain a status bonus to initiative rolls equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier. You gain the @UUID[Item.2cy1DUcgb1LuQmzA]{Lead the way!} free action shout.

Dons de compétencesNiveau 2

Au niveau 2, puis tous les deux niveaux, vous gagnez un don de compétence. Ces dons disposent du trait compétence. Pour choisir un don de compétence, vous devez être au moins qualifié dans la compétence correspondante.

Imbued armementNiveau 3

Paragons are ones with their armements, you gain the @UUID[Item.Ckp6kE3fYHlswYBR]{Favored spear} feature.

Additionaly, you can choose one of the following effects :

  • @UUID[Item.6Meau3n2F73kFqnc]{Imbued shield} You can cast Guidance as an innate spell. Once per minute, you can cast each spell you gain through this ability as you make a Raise a shield action. It gains the concentrate et manipulate traits. Reactions triggered occurs before you gain the benefit of the circumstance bonus to AC of your shield. You can not cast spells that you got from any other source through Imbued Shield.
  • @UUID[Item.aHY10ZEU6R1hIMgf]{Ornate armor} Once per day, when you have no Focus point in your pool, you instantly recover 1 Focus point. If you are in Encounter mode, this occurs at the beginning of your next turn.

 

At level 7, you gain the following effect according to your armements :

  • Imbued shield You add add Liberating Command to your innate spells available.
  • Ornate armor When you use a focus point, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level for 1 round.

 

At level 13, you gain the following effect according to your armements :

  • Imbued shield You add add True Strike to your innate spells available.
  • Ornate armor Once per day, if you have no focus points left, you can make a signet you already know (except Living echo) without any action or focus point cost

Dons générauxNiveau 3

Au niveau 3, puis tous les quatre niveaux, vous gagnez un don général.

Améliorations de compétenceNiveau 3

Au niveau 3, puis tous les deux niveaux, vous gagnez une amélioration de compétence. Vous pouvez utiliser cette amélioration pour augmenter votre rang de maîtrise et devenir qualifié dans une compétence dans laquelle vous étiez inexpérimenté ou pour améliorer votre rang dans une compétence dans laquelle vous êtes déjà qualifié pour devenir expert.

À partir du niveau 7, vous pouvez utiliser l'amélioration de compétence pour devenir maître dans une compétence dans laquelle vous êtes déjà expert et à partir du niveau 15, vous pouvez l'utiliser pour devenir légendaire dans une compétence dans laquelle vous êtes déjà maître.

Primes de caractéristiquesNiveau 5

Au niveau 5, puis tous les cinq niveaux, vous améliorez quatre caractéristiques différentes. Vous pouvez utiliser ces primes de caractéristique pour faire passer une valeur de caractéristique au-dessus de 18. La prime augmente la valeur de caractéristique de 1 si elle est déjà de 18 ou plus ou de 2 si elle est inférieure à 18.

Dons ancestrauxNiveau 5

Vous gagnez un don ancestral au niveau 5 puis tous les quatre niveaux, en plus de celui avec lequel vous avez commencé.

Expertise avec les armesNiveau 5

Vous vous consacrez à l'apprentissage approfondi du maniement de vos armes. Votre rang de maîtrise avec les armes simples, les attaques à mains nues et les armes de guerre passe à expert.

Expertise avec les armuresNiveau 7

Vous avez passé tellement de temps en armure que vous savez tirer le meilleur parti de la protection qu'elles offrent. Votre rang de maîtrise avec les armures légères, intermédiaires et lourdes, ainsi qu'avec la défense sans armure, passe à expert. Vous gagnez les effets spécialisés des armures intermédiaires et lourdes.

Spécialisation martialeNiveau 7

Vous avez appris à infliger de graves blessures avec les armes que vous connaissez le mieux. Vous infligez 2 dégâts de plus avec les armes et les attaques à mains nues pour lesquelles vous êtes expert. Ces dégâts passent à 3 si vous êtes maître et à 4 si vous êtes légendaire.

Expertise du championNiveau 9

Les prières renforcent votre puissance divine. Votre rang de maîtrise dans le DD de classe de champion, les jets d'attaque des sorts divins et les DD de vos sorts divins, passe à expert.

Châtiment divinNiveau 9

Votre réaction de champion s'améliore.

Consultez les causes spécifiques pour plus d'informations.

JuggernautNiveau 9

Votre corps s'est habitué à l'effort physique et à résister aux maladies. Votre rang de maîtrise pour les jets de Vigueur devient maître. Quand vous obtenez un succès sur un jet de Vigueur, vous remportez à la place un succès critique.

Réflexes fulgurantsNiveau 9

Vos réflexes sont fulgurants. Votre rang de maîtrise pour les jets de Réflexes passe à expert.

VigilanceNiveau 11

Vous restez à l'affût des menaces alentour. Votre rang de maîtrise en Perception passe à expert.

Résolution divineNiveau 11

Votre foi vous permet de parfaitement contrôler votre volonté. Votre rang de maîtrise pour les jets de Volonté passe à maître. Quand vous obtenez un succès à un jet de Volonté, celui-ci est transformé en succès critique.

ExaltationNiveau 11

Votre réaction de champion exalte les alliés à proximité, ce qui leur permet d'en bénéficier eux aussi.

Consultez les causes spécifiques pour plus d'informations.

Maîtrise des armuresNiveau 13

Vous améliorez votre maîtrise des armures, ce qui vous permet d'encaisser plus de coups. Votre rang de maîtrise avec les armures légères, intermédiaires et lourdes, ainsi qu'avec la défense sans armure, passe à maître.

Maîtrise martialeNiveau 13

Vous connaissez parfaitement vos armes. Votre rang de maîtrise avec les armes simples et les armes de guerre passe à maître.

Spécialisation martiale supérieureNiveau 15

Les dégâts que vous infligez grâce à votre spécialisation martiale passent à 4 avec les armes et les attaques à mains nues si vous possédez le rang expert avec celles-ci, à 6 si vous possédez le rang maître et à 8 si vous possédez le rang légendaire.

Maîtrise du championNiveau 17

Vous utilisez à présent parfaitement l'arsenal des techniques et des sorts divins du champion. Votre rang de maîtrise dans le DD de classe de champion, les jets d'attaque des sorts divins et les DD de vos sorts divins, passe à maître.

Armure légendaireNiveau 17

Votre foi vous protège tout aussi efficacement que l'acier. Votre rang de maîtrise avec les armures légères, intermédiaires et lourdes, ainsi qu'avec la défense sans armure, passe à légendaire.

Défi du hérosNiveau 19

Vous pouvez braver le destin et continuer à combattre tant qu'il vous reste de l'énergie divine. Vous gagnez le sort de dévotion @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uGXWkR2h8q9MRzEM]{Défi du héros}.

You gain the reaction @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.QBT6ZdGdkhPC3D6D]{Ballad of restoration}R

Frequency Once per day.

Trigger An ally at shout range makes a Stride, Burrow, Fly, or Swim action.

The ally gains the effects of your amp @UUID[Item.5IGPae4HkAHp3G2U]{Rally!} shout. For each 5 feet of movement they make farther from their initial square, they are healed by an amount of hit points equal to half your level (minimum 1).
You can choose an additional Imbued armement.

Paragons are ones with their armements, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.Ckp6kE3fYHlswYBR]{Favored spear}feature.

Additionaly, you can choose one of the following effects :

  • @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.6Meau3n2F73kFqnc]{Imbued shield} You can cast Guidance as an innate spell. Once per minute, you can cast each spell you gain through this ability as you make a Raise a shield action. It gains the concentrate et manipulate traits. Reactions triggered occurs before you gain the benefit of the circumstance bonus to AC of your shield. You can not cast spells that you got from any other source through Imbued Shield.
  • @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.aHY10ZEU6R1hIMgf]{Ornate armor} Once per day, when you have no Focus point in your pool, you instantly recover 1 Focus point. If you are in Encounter mode, this occurs at the beginning of your next turn.

 

At level 7, you gain the following effect according to your armements :

  • Imbued shield You add add Liberating Command to your innate spells available.
  • Ornate armor When you use a focus point, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level for 1 round.

 

At level 13, you gain the following effect according to your armements :

  • Imbued shield You add add True Strike to your innate spells available.
  • Ornate armor Once per day, if you have no focus points left, you can make a signet you already know (except Living echo) without any action or focus point cost
Range of your shouts are doubled. You gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.kDASD4qlq5iMUIAB]{Resonnance} signet.

Frequency Once per minute.

Choose one shout action. It looses its shout trait and gains the signet trait, and then can be added as a signet for your next shout action.

You hurry your group to retreat from battle, or charge forward.

Effect You and allies at shout range gain 10 feet (2 squares) of additional movement for their next Stride, Burrow, Fly or Swim action.

@UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.aL2YS2WvWb7tQsRZ]{Effect : Rally!}

Amp The additionnal movement speed is increased to 15 feet and does not provoke reactions.

Use this amp in place of a shout's normal amp entry. The 
amped shout must be @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.w4BWNmSOCLweLbEE]{On guard!}.

You instill vigor in your allies to stand into battle. Each creatures affected gains a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped for the duration of the shout. Additionally, they gains a +1 circumstance bonus to armor class until the end of  the shout. If affected allies leave their square by a move action or by forced movement, this effect ends prematurely on them. On the contrary, allies that didn't leave their square during their turn benefit from the shout (and its signet, if any) on their next turn as if you added the Resonance signet.
You learn the @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.QG8QmW9jlmAl0VJG]{Protective word} warcry. Increase the maximum of your Focus pool of 1, to a maximum of 3 Focus Points.

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Assistance divine (Guidance)} as an innate spell. Once per minute, you can cast each spell you gain through this ability as you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Lever un bouclier (Raise a Shield)}. It gains the concentrate et manipulate traits. Reactions triggered occurs before you gain the benefit of the circumstance bonus to AC of your shield. You can not cast spells that you got from any other source through Imbued Shield.

Level 7 You add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0Dcd4iEXqCrkm4Jn]{Ordre libérateur (Liberating Command)} to your innate spells available.

Level 13  You add add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Coup au but (True Strike)} to your innate spells available

Requirements You are holding a thrown weapon.
Frequency Once per turn.

Make a ranged attack roll with a thrown weapon. Your strike deals an additionnal 1d8 precision damage for each stage of the highest condition value on the target, to a maximum of 3d8 precision damage.

Trigger You or an ally within shout range rolls a saving throw against a mental effect.

You can purge fear and doubt on you allies's minds. Roll a Diplomacy check. You and allies at shout range can use the better result between your Diplomacy check and the saving throw.

Trigger You have no actions left and are finishing your 
turn.
Frequency Once per day.

All of your shout actions and activities (and their signets effects) you made during this turn are repeated at the beginning of your next turn, just before your regain your actions. This effect include shouts already repeated this turn by a @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.kDASD4qlq5iMUIAB]{Resonnance} signet. You are Fatigued until your next daily preparation

You gain the free action @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.2cy1DUcgb1LuQmzA]{Lead the way!}F

Requirements You are conscious and none of your senses are impaired.

Trigger You have made an initiative roll and one of your allies has a lower result, and no creatures have acted yet. 

You can exchange your place in initiative order with an ally with a lower initiative roll. You can affect this character with a one-action shout, if you do so, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Ralenti (Slowed) 1} for the first round.

You can spend 10 minutes focusing on a weapon with the thrown trait. In your hands, this weapon gains the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Boomerang (rune) (Returning)} property rune. You can only give this ability to one weapon at a time, and only you can benefit from this effect. If you do this with a new weapon, the previous one loses its property.

Prerequisites You are wielding a shield or a weapon with the 
parry trait.

A You raise your shield and you can make a Recall Knowledge to identify a creature. 

Trigger An ally make a Recall Knowledge about a creature.

R You raise your shield. As a part of this reaction, your  ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to his check. This bonus  increases to +2 if you are expert in the skill used by your ally for his check.
You have specialize in a versatile combat strategy. Whenever you use 3 new different shouts successively, you regain one Focus point, to a maximum of your Focus pool.

Requirements One ally is affected by a Clumsy, Drained, Enfeebled, Stupefied condition with a duration no more than 1 minute.

Make a Occulstism or Religion check against one of the condition's DC affecting one ally. You and that ally are healed by an amount equal to half your level for each successfuly ended, decreased, or transfered condition (see below). You can’t transfer to you a condition if you have already a value of this condition (If you are already Clumsy, you can’t transfer your ally’s Clumsy condition to you).


Critical Success Reduce the value of the condition 
by 2.
Success Reduce the value of the condition by 1.
Failure As success, but the condition is transfered to 
you at the same stage before the effect of this shout, 
even if it ended on your ally.
Critical Failure The ally is immune to your Signet 
of Purification for 1 day.

Your savage throw shut down particular abilities on your target. On a hit, their stance ends, and any aura is supressed for 1 round. On a critical hit, auras are disabled for 3 rounds. You can add this effect to your @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.lCiD2uUl2ZmzLQbj]{Disrupting throw} reaction for a free action.

Alchimiste, Barde, Conjurateur, Druide, Ensorceleur, Oracle, Prêtre, Psychiste, Sorcier, Magicien Vous avez appris à infliger des blessures graves avec les armes que vous savez manier. Vous infligez 2 dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes et les attaques à mains nues pour lesquelles vous êtes expert. Ces dégâts passent à 3 si vous êtes maître et à 4 si vous êtes légendaire.

Barbare Votre rage vous permet de frapper plus fort. Vous infligez 2 dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes et les attaques à mains nues pour lesquelles vous possédez un rang de maîtrise expert. Ces dégâts passent à 3 si vous êtes maître et à 4 si vous êtes légendaire. Vous gagnez le pouvoir de spécialisation de votre instinct.

Bretteur, Champion, Enquêteur, Franc-tireur, Guerrier, Inventeur, Magus, Moine, Rôdeur, Roublard, Thaumaturge Vous avez appris à infliger de graves blessures avec les armes que vous connaissez le mieux. Vous infligez 2 dégâts de plus avec les armes et les attaques à mains nues pour lesquelles vous êtes expert. Ces dégâts passent à 3 si vous êtes maître et à 4 si vous êtes légendaire.

Trigger An ally in shout range is knocked prone.

You instantly encourage allies to fight when they fall. An ally at shout range can use their reaction to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Stand}.

Requirements You are wielding a melee or a thrown 
weapon.

As a master of combat you know where to hit. Make a Strike. The target makes a Fortitude save against your class DC. If you are affected by a @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.TLxUty5gdnLDpAU4]{On my mark!} shout, they get a -2 circumstance penalty on their save. This attack count as two attacks toward your multiple attack penalty.


Critical Success No effect.
Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.
Failure The target is@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.
Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}.

Vous avez appris à vous déplacer rapidement afin d'échapper aux explosions, au souffle d'un dragon et à bien pire. Votre rang de maîtrise pour les jets de Réflexes passe à maître. Quand vous obtenez un succès sur un jet de Réflexes, celui-ci est transformé en succès critique.

Requirements You are weilding a melee weapon.

Stride then Strike in melee. If you hit, you can make a one action shout. This shout is not affected by limitations of the shout trait and can be used normally on subsequents turns.

Requirements You are wielding a thrown weapon.

Weapons with the thrown trait in your hands gains powerful effects. Each time you make a ranged attack with such weapons, you can choose one of the following property rune effect to add to your strike : @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.n8MonEa4ZBdvEovc]{Brilliant (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ri9QkRCD6cAbQ6t3]{Impactful (Greater)}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Lb7F2BR9X9TF1vjX]{Thundering (Greater)}. Once per turn, when you hit an enemy with your thrown weapon, you can make a shout activity of your choice. Also, if you lose your weapon in any way, you can call it back in your hand as a free action. If it's destroyed, it comes back at the beginning of your next turn in a halo of light from the skies.

As a last stand, you call upon the inner strength of your gods, your magic, or your courage. 

Unconscious allies are healed to half their maximum hit points and your Drained condition increases to 1 for each ally healed this way, to a maximum of Drained 4.

Dead allies (that died in the last minute) are resurrected at half their maximum hit points as temporary hit points that lasts for 1 round and your Doomed condition increased to 1 for each ally resurrected this way. If you would reach Doomed 4 by the effect of this shout, you die, and you can't be resurrected except by the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} or a similar effect. 
Allies resurrected die anyway at the end of this shout effects and can not be saved by spells or effects that would prevent them from dying like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life} once resurected.
Whatever number of allies your have affected by We shall return !, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, and you can no longer make shout abilities, until your next daily preparations.

Frequency Once per round.

Your voice is strong enough to move the earth, and foes. Choose one creature at shout range and attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}. You use your Intimidation skill instead of your Athletics for this check. The Shove action loses its attack trait. 
D You affect a 15-foot cone. Your are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. You can't make a Roar of the Wind for 10 minutes.

Amp You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} each target succesfully shoved by your shout. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}. You can't do Roar of the Wind for a day.

Vivifying shouts of Chieftains allow they allies to stand their ground beyond their own resources.

Chieftain's features

  • Your are trained in Occultism or Religion.
  • Your Signet of Life warcry's heal use d10 instead of d8.
  • You gain the reaction @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.QBT6ZdGdkhPC3D6D]{Ballad of restoration}R

Presence of GloryNiveau 11

Increase the movement speed by 5 additional feet for both version of your @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.5IGPae4HkAHp3G2U]{Rally!} shout. When you make a @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.QBT6ZdGdkhPC3D6D]{Ballad of restoration} reaction, you or an ally at range gain the same amount of healing as your ally did from their movement, as temporary hit points that lasts 1 minute.

Presence of PrestigeNiveau 17

You are always under the effect of your one action @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.5IGPae4HkAHp3G2U]{Rally!} shout. If you are affected again by your @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.5IGPae4HkAHp3G2U]{Rally!} shout, from your two\u0002 action shout for example, you gain the effect of your amped shout until the beginning of your next turn.

You gain 2 bonus damage with weapons with the thrown trait until the end of your turn if you have made a shout during your turn.
When you make ranged attacks with thrown weapons, that are not agile or finesse, you can choose to use your Strength's modifier instead of your Dexterity for your ranged attack rolls. Weapons used this way gains the volley trait with a distance equal to it's thrown trait, giving you a -2 to your attack rolls.

At level 3, the bonus damage increases to 3, and the volley trait penalty is reduced to 1.

At level 7, the bonus damage increases to 5.

At level 13, the bonus damage increases to 7.

At level 13, the bonus damage increases to 10. Increase the range increments of your thrown weapons by 5 feet, and reduce the penalty to ranged attacks above your first increment by 1.

As long as an enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} by one of your effects, like the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} action, the foe is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and  @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}. If you made a shout action or activity during your turn and the foe can see or hear you, its Frightened value can not be lowered under Firghtened 1.
When you make a one-action shout on an ally, you are also affected by the effect of your shout.

Requirments You are holding a weapon with the thrown trait.

You hit your ennemy with brutal force. Make a Strike, if you hit, your foe must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC. This strike counts as two strike toward your mutiple attack penalty.


Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target is dazzled for 1 round.
Failure The target is Stunned 1.
Critical Failure The target is Stunned 1, and dazzled 
for 1 minute.

Champion, enquêteur, magus, oracle Vous vous êtes consacré à l'apprentissage des subtilités de vos armes. Vos rangs de maîtrise avec les armes simples, les armes de guerre et les attaques à mains nues passent à expert.

You sing a lullaby that enthralls the battlefield. During Song of Concentration, you can no longer make shout actions or activities. Allies at shout range no longer need to use an action to concentrate to Sustain a spell (once per turn per ally).

Once per day, when you have no Focus point in your pool, you instantly recover 1 Focus point. If you are in Encounter mode, this occurs at the beginning of your next turn.

Level 7 When you use a focus point, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level for 1 round.

Level 13   Once per day, if you have no focus points left, you can make a signet you already know (except Living echo) without any action or focus point cost.

Requirements You take a critical hit, make a critical failure against a saving throw, or your shield breaks by an attack or a creature's effect.

Frequency Once per day.

The ally gains the effects of your amped On Guard ! shout. After the damage reduction and the damage being delt, they gain an amount of temporary hit points equal to the damage taken (to a maximum of 10 + your level) for 1 minute.

When you use your aid reaction, you are always considered at master proficiency for the result of the check you attempted for the result of your Aid. If you are master already, you are considered legendary.
You learn the @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.BJ7f1p7oge8Lm3U6]{Living echo} signet.

Frequency Once per minute.

Your next shout's effects reoccur for one more round. At the beginning of your next turn, a shout action augmented with this signet is repeated as if you have casted it normally. This specific shout action can not be made again until the beginning of the next round after this effect ends, as normal limitations for shouts.

Your experience of battle and your training grant you special powerful shouts or augmentations called  respectively warcries and signets, which are a type of focus spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell, and you start with a focus pool of 2 Focus Points. You refill your focus pool during your daily preparations, and you regain 1 Focus Point by spending 10 minutes using the Refocus activity to train, meditate, or healing wounds of a battle.
Warcries and signets are automatically heightened to half your level rounded up. Certain feats can give you more focus spells and increase the size of your focus pool, though your focus pool can never hold more than 3 Focus Points.


SIGNETS

Actions with the signet trait, usually from paragon feats, tweak the properties of your shouts, like metamagic for spellcasters. You must use a signet action directly before using the shout action you want to alter. If you use any action (including free actions and reactions) other than a shout action directly after, you waste the benefits of the signet action. Any additional effects added by a signet action are part of the shout’s effect, not of the signet action itself.
You gain the @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.YBl81rzE3WuCaxly]{Signet of Life} signet.
Your are permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. You can only make shout or signet actions (or activity) with the bonus action granted from this effect.

Requirments You are holding a thrown weapon.
Trigger An enemy in the first range increment of your thrown weapon makes a manipulate or move action.

Make a Strike with a thrown weapon against the triggering creature. If your attack is a critical hit, you disrupt that action, but you do normal damage. You take a -2 circumstance to this attack roll if your target is at melee range with you.

Requirements You make an amped shout action or activity.
Frequency Once per 10 minutes.

Each ally affected by your shout is also affected by your @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.YBl81rzE3WuCaxly]{Signet of Life}. This effect does not count as a signet and you can augment your shout with another signet, but not @UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.YBl81rzE3WuCaxly]{Signet of Life}.
Increase the range increment of your thrown weapons by an additional 10 feet.

As a Paragon, your learn three fundamental shouts to help you in battle.

@UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.TLxUty5gdnLDpAU4]{On my mark!} A

Determination in your voice fills your allies with courage and make them know when to strike.

@UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.w4BWNmSOCLweLbEE]{On guard!} A

You are aware when danger can strike your ally and urge an ally to perfect its defense against it.

@UUID[Compendium.world.paragon.Item.5IGPae4HkAHp3G2U]{Rally!} A

You hurry your group to retreat from battle, or charge forward.
